summary: My Predictions page testing completed - all core functionality working correctly with minor authentication redirect issue

minor_issues.issue: Token extraction in test shows no explicit token in response
minor_issues.impact: Authentication works via cookies, not blocking functionality

minor_issues.issue: After login from protected route access, user redirected to homepage instead of original destination (/my-predictions)
minor_issues.workaround: User can manually navigate to My Predictions after login

passed_tests: GET /api/predictions/me/detailed returns proper structure with predictions, summary, total
My Predictions page loads at /my-predictions when authenticated
Summary section shows correct stats (5 Total, 2 Correct, 1 Wrong, 2 Pending)
Filter tabs (All, Live, Upcoming, Finished) work with proper counts
Prediction cards show competition, teams, scores, status, timestamps, user picks
Green styling for correct predictions with 'Correct' badge
Red styling for wrong predictions with 'Wrong' badge
Header dropdown 'My Predictions' link navigates correctly
Empty state displays with 'Explore Matches' button functionality
All backend API endpoints properly secured (401 without auth)
Backend authentication works with cookie-based sessions
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication redirect flow so users are returned to /my-predictions after login when accessing it directly without authentication. Currently redirects to homepage instead of original destination.
